name: Sol Cayo Coco

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We returned a few weeks ago from Sol Cayo Coco and thought I'd have a look at the reviews from other people that stayed at the same hotel as us at this time.
reviews.title: Amazing, relaxing holiday

likes.liked: — So close to beautiful beaches - very friendly
likes.disliked: — Needs a lick of paint here or there

reviews.title: hol of a lifetime
reviews.text: Overall, we really did have a fantastic holiday. We didn't experience ANY of the problems that other holidayers have had, however, a couple of friends we met did have a few problems with damp rooms etc.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I do agree that the hotel is not a 4* hotel, certainly not a 4* that I am used to anyway. It is probably a 3* but this really did not affect the quality of my holiday.
reviews.title: Great relaxing place!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I discovered when reading the reviews prior to travelling that some of the rooms were damp so I emailed the hotel a few weeks beforehand to request a sea view in the hope that our room may be better, which we received. The view was beautiful (see my photos), room was large, everything worked ok and never any evidence of any bugs at all. It was a basic room but we only slept and got ready in our room so really not of relevance to us. The main thing that it was cleaned daily. Our balcony was also a fair size but I have seen a photo from another holidayer which balcony was considerably smaller than ours. It may be worth emailing the hotel beforehand as I did. Obviously they are not guaranteed but the staff will do anything to help you.
reviews.title: Hotel ok, but in need of refurbishment.

likes.liked: — Staff were excellent, lots of childrens activities
likes.disliked: — Rooms and hotel overall looking a bit worn, too few sunbeds near pool area.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The only thing I would mention is that we had a really rubbish shower, sometimes we had to leave it on for a while to get the warm water to any sort of pressure. Cold water is fine but the hot water is pretty pitiful!!!!
reviews.title: Good But could be better

reviews.text: I really don't understand where these bad reviews are comming from.I loved this place. I've gone to many places around the carribean and south america and this was one of my favourite vacations. I stayed there for a week and didn't want to go home. I made friends with the staff.. the beach was PICTURE PEFRECT .. the food was good .. hotel rooms were spacious and clean .. and the weather in cayo coco was amazing. There's not much more i could ask for. Many of the people we met at the resort were people who have gone back many times. I plan on going back in april.
reviews.title: Amazing

reviews.text: We have just returned from a 1 week stay at Sol Cayo Coco. We were not in the least disapointed. The transfer from the airport to the hotel was flawless and very fast, the buses were new and very comfortable. The only holdup was a fellow traveller who as usual - did not read the paper work and tried to bring walk-talkies into the county - which are not allowed - so he held up the entire bus. Advice to you folks who think you can break the rules - this is Cuba - you follow the rules here.
reviews.title: A lovely place

likes.disliked: — No railings on most stairways - diffucult for seniors

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Check-in was also fast. the room was large and clean and the air conditioning worked - the washroom was large and the room had the best black out curtains of any hotel we have every stayed in.
reviews.title: Cold Food

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The staff was friendly and very helpful.
reviews.title: What are you miserable people talking about? Loved it!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I can say there was only one grumpy bar tender at the ocean bar and restaurant.
reviews.title: Listen to Streak222 - It's great!

reviews.text: booked through thomas cook who insisted on booking definately 4star!!!!!! we normally stay 5star and realise in some countries 5 is 4, 4is 3 etc etc and we hate to complain, on holiday you want a hassle free time and shouldnt have to feel let down and ripped off!!!!! on arrival the rep margaret did the quickest disappearing act, the queue for check in was like a cattlemarket!! we found our room dirty, smelling of strong musty mould and totally inhabitable, after complaining we were told a room would be ready in half an hour 4 hours later at 11pm we went to the second room again the same the bedding was damp and mould wason curtains electrical sockets hanging off disgusted we went back to reception I tried tocontact rep no answer!!! there were other people complaining of same rooms awful etc, we had to sleep in the room and were promised another in morning, the third room wasnt ready until 3pm following day and the services manager was brilliant and apologetic the room was on top floor and we left the doors open all the time to gain sea breeze had the curtains washed and made sure the room was cleaned properly. The whole hotel should be demolished, the toilets throughout we continually backing up!!! food was awful we had 14 nights here and felt trapped, and could not wait to leave!!
reviews.title: hell hole

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: the beach was our only saviour apart from being unable to swim in the sea due to vast numbers of JELLYFISH which several people got stung by. the cuban beach restuarant was ok we lived on squid for lunch and when the fish was fresh it was great had couple of days where fish was very old and my husband had a very rotton one cooked it stank!!! The thomas cook rep wasnt interested at all and too upgrade would have cost £400-500 each so we made the most of the weather and beach. all i can say is thomas cook should not allow this to continue. people had things stolen i witnessed a gardener in a room with the maids taking clothes out, i told staff and nothing was done. We tipped alot and our maid did a fair job. do not go!!!!!
reviews.title: super super

likes.liked: — the view it was not to good clean but basic

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: well where do i start !!!! This was a super holiday i went through all the reviews for this hotel and i did have my concerns with all the bad reviews i was very worried when i left home . But i can only give my honest review and this is how it is.
reviews.title: loved every minute of it

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: First the accomadation this was the only down fall its basic and the decor is the same please be prepared for this but it is clean and tidy the hotel has some older rooms at the back of the hotel and the better ones are at the front pool view , but it you ask when you get there they will move you within 24 hours as we did.
reviews.title: Second Time Can't Wait For The Third!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The food !!!!! wow thats all i can say its perfect in every way plenty of choice but can sometimes not be to hot so go for the food being cooked in front of you if you prefer that but i dont have any complaints about the other food it is fine, also plenty of english food on offer at all times.
reviews.title: Great People

likes.liked: — The people for the most part were very accomodating

reviews.text: before we went away we read lots of reviews about the resort, it put me off, and i thought i would have a terrible time,but i can honestly say that we had a wonderfull time along with our friends.
reviews.title: great holiday
Absolutely Magical
reviews.text: the room was a little smelly but once the air conditioning was on it cleared and never came back. staff were great and would always help, never got pestered as other reports have said.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: food was ok, no problems there. lots of trips and beach activities
reviews.title: Absolutely beautiful! YES my pictures are taken at same resort as the log below!

reviews.text: i would recommend it and have many good memories no bad ones at all
reviews.title: Over rated not a 4* more like 2*

reviews.text: I visited the sol with my boyfriend both in early twenties and there's always something happening. There were young children through to our age group to older couples who all seemed to be having a great time.
reviews.title: Went with an open mind, bad reviews spot on

description: A good standard property with an excellent beachfront location. Sol Cayo Coco is the only hotel with access to two different but equally charming beaches, situated amidst gardens and palm grove facing the sea and the white fine sand beach. The hotel is ideal for families with children, diving lovers, fishing, nautical activities and birdwatching. Sol Cayo Coco is the perfect spot to combine great fun with fantastic relaxation.
